name: The Upside Down (Roflomo)
description:
Incomplete prototype for GameDevMcGill's October jam, with the theme of Upside-Down. Currently does not have a win condition. Try to get to the second floor!

Credits:

  • O. Kaya - Programmer

  • Thomas Jiralerspong - Sound Design
  • Katie Schunk - Artist
